Feb. 13, 1937 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section) 10 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-a
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Town Hall, Pontypridd 4 bands competed.
Nov. 14, 2013, 11:40 a.m. Jan. 17, 2014, 1:57 p.m.
1 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Thomas James Powell Halevy [arr. Round]
2 Parc and Dare Band W. Haydn Bebb Life Divine
3 Cardiff Corporation Transport Harry Nuttall Kenilworth
4 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Terry Jenkins Mendelssohn [arr. Round]
